text: Patricia "Patsy" Byrne (13 July 1933 - 17 June 2014) was an English actress. She was best known on television for her role as Nursie in the BBC sitcoms Blackadder and Blackadder II. Her best known movie roles were in Les Mis√©rables (1998) and Blackadder Back & Forth (1999). Byrne was born in Ashford, Kent. She was married to Patrick John Seccombe from 1967 until his death in 2000. Byrne died on 17 June 2014 at Denville Hall, a retirement home for performers in Northwood, London. She was 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Kent Category:Disease-related deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Ashford, Kent
title: Patsy Byrne
